detectors.description:
Contract locking ether found in :
	Contract AirDrop (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AirDrop__1.sol#179-215) has payable functions:
	 - AirDrop.sendAirDrop() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AirDrop__1.sol#199-204)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether or the call value is 0
detectors.markdown:
Contract locking ether found in :
	Contract [AirDrop](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AirDrop__1.sol#L179-L215) has payable functions:
	 - [AirDrop.sendAirDrop()](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AirDrop__1.sol#L199-L204)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether or the call value is 0

detectors.description: AirDrop.refund() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AirDrop__1.sol#196-198) ignores return value by token.transfer(owner(),token.balanceOf(this)) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AirDrop__1.sol#197)
AirDrop.sendAirDrop() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AirDrop__1.sol#199-204) ignores return value by token.transfer(msg.sender,valueAirDrop) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AirDrop__1.sol#203)

AirDrop.multisend(address[]) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AirDrop__1.sol#205-213) ignores return value by token.transfer(_addressDestination[i],valueAirDrop) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AirDrop__1.sol#210)

AirDrop.setValueAirDrop(uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AirDrop__1.sol#189-191) should emit an event for: 
	- valueAirDrop = _valueAirDrop (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AirDrop__1.sol#190)

AirDrop.setTokenAddress(address)._address (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AirDrop__1.sol#192) lacks a zero-check on :
		- tokenAddress = _address (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AirDrop__1.sol#193)

AirDrop.multisend(address[]) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AirDrop__1.sol#205-213) has external calls inside a loop: token.transfer(_addressDestination[i],valueAirDrop) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AirDrop__1.sol#210)
detectors.markdown: [AirDrop.multisend(address[])](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AirDrop__1.sol#L205-L213) has external calls inside a loop: [token.transfer(_addressDestination[i],valueAirDrop)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AirDrop__1.sol#L210)
